column2: Fix bug in resizing of DialogWrapper with large error label

column3:
If the error label in the DialogWrapper is displayed on multiple lines,
any update of the error message that keeps it on several lines will
cause the dialog window to shrink.
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
No individual CLA applies to this contribution; it's work for hire at Google and covered by the agreement between Google and JetBrains.
